articles.title: Sheila O takes show to Dubai - Punch Newspapers
articles.description: The popular lifestyle series, ‘How Far with Sheila O’, is taking its fifth season to Dubai, the United Arab Emirates. The show, which is a spin-off from Afrozons Radio in the United States of America, is hosted by Sheila O, and is noted for its interviews of …
